content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mine at position (17.0, 1.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- BurnerMiningDrill at position (17.0, 1.0) mining coal.
- WoodenChest at position (17.5, 2.5) collecting coal from the drill.

### Iron Ore Mine at position (17.0, 72.0)
Consists of the following entity:
- BurnerMiningDrill at position (17.0, 72.0) mining iron ore. The output is currently blocked as there is no chest or belt to collect the ore.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure the target tile is clear of obstructions (other entities, items on the ground, unbuildable terrain like water) before attempting to place an entity. Check the specific coordinates mentioned in the error message.
- When using `place_entity_next_to`, be mindful of potential collisions with existing entities or items dropped on the ground near the reference entity. Consider increasing the spacing or changing the placement direction if collisions occur.

### Errors when picking up items
- Auto-pickup (by walking over items) might not always work reliably or
